headline: Why Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of power management chips maker Monolithic Power Systems (NASDAQ:MPWR) fell 3.1% in the afternoon session after broad sell-off in the semiconductor sector, triggered by a disappointing forecast from peer chipmaker Marvell Technology.
